intent_atoms.description: The release readiness checklist and go-live runbook must be published at Documentation/ISOInspector.docc/Guides/ReleaseReadinessRunbook.md

Publish the release readiness checklist and go‑live runbook to provide QA gates, documentation deliverables, distribution packaging steps, and post‑release bookkeeping tied to shared distribution metadata and notarization tooling.
The guide must capture QA gates, documentation deliverables, distribution packaging steps, and post‑release bookkeeping tied to shared distribution metadata and notarization tooling.
MacOS UI automation and Combine benchmark runs cannot proceed until hardware is available
Evaluate options for hosting DocC archives beyond GitHub Releases to improve release artifact discoverability.
